scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.update-all: npm update && npm update --prefix server && npm update --prefix client
scripts.outdated-all: (npm outdated || true) && (npm outdated --prefix server || true) && (npm outdated --prefix client || true)
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm start --prefix server" "npm run watch  --prefix client"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix client
